I had an emergency c section for placental abruption in January 2015 when i was 34 weeks along. Sadly my baby didn't make and my husband and I were devastated.  Given the circumstance,  my doctor gave me the green light to start trying after 3 months. I was pregnant again by March 2015 & I'm due in December.  Also, I'm planning for a vbac as and not a repeat c section. Just find a provider to work with you who is supportive. In most cases however, it is generally recommended to wait 12-18 months between pregnancies :)  good luck :)
If mom's body doesn't have about a year in between pregnancies,  risk of health complications for her and the next baby increase.

I was told to wait a year, and he still repeats himself with concerns about waiting a year and to take every precaution needed to prevent pregnancy before the year mark. And I've never said anything other then having no interest in getting pregnant anytime soon because it terrifies me. My daughter is 6months and I still feel pain every once in awhile because I'm not fully healed.

title: How soon can you try again after c section?
